body: The combination of the the three states a Variable can be in {unrepeated, first-time repeated, many repeated} and the mutation of grad_fn/output_nr/next_functions as raw data structures makes this code hard to understand. Changes are probably not needed, but it does take a long time to figure out what is happening.
